title: Little Book of Big Experiences Package
seo_title: Little Book of Big Experiences Package | Wine Country Inn
seo_description: Experience St. Helena during Napa Valley’s Cabernet Season.
short_description: Experience St. Helena during Napa Valley’s Cabernet Season.
long_description:
Experience St. Helena during Napa Valley's Cabernet Season. November through March is the time to enjoy the laid back atmosphere of the valley when the vines have been harvested and the wine has been put to rest in the cellar. St. Helena's top wineries, restaurants and hotels welcome guests to cozy up in this small town with our "Little Book of Big Experiences". We have put together 25 Big Experiences that will entice you to visit once, twice or more and stay for several days each trip. We have done all of the work for you. These special experiences are best enjoyed Sunday through Thursday when you will receive that personal touch. Wine Club Member benefits, Barrel Tastings, Wine and Food Pairings. Vineyard view rooms, cozy dinners and holiday shopping. All this will make you remember St. Helena as a small town with Big Charm…and even bigger experiences.

$100 value per book , two books per reservation, based on double occupancy. Please plan ahead to visit our properties as most require appointments or have specific tasting hours.

Book holder is entitled to complimentary wine tasting at all of the wineries included in the book. Please see individual pages for specific experiences. Note: Sunday through Thursday and Friday – Saturday experiences may differ.

When making your lodging or dining reservation please mention you are a "Little Book" holder.

No shared tastings, one per book.

For group experiences please contact our Experience Concierge at concierge@winecountryinn.com.

All book holders must be at least 21 years of age - Please be prepared to show identification. * Contact our Experience Concierge to assist with your itinerary concierge@winecountryinn.com.

Got to www.sthelena.com/experiences/ for more information on what the Little Book of Big Experiences has to offer!
